abstract: Come for the rock climbing and stay for the interesting and diverse community. Filmed as part of 'ACMI in the Regions: Stories from Horsham Shire'.
description: Meet the business owners and locals who call Natimuk home and wouldn't want to live anywhere else. Even though locals consider it to be full of 'climbers' and 'arty-types', they recognise Natimuk, in western Victoria, as an active and diverse community and wouldn't have it any other way.
